backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with access control, user profiles, transaction/expense types, storage maps, and functions to manage profiles, transactions, and expenses.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that converts old transaction records to a new format with additional timestamp fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of key frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and configuration files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA settings, icons, and service‑worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache setup, cleanup, and a network‑first fetch strategy with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring authentication layout, routing, theme provider, and global query client.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, navigation menu, and user dropdown showing profile info and logout.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Displays a custom PWA install prompt using the beforeinstallprompt event and stores dismiss state in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Shows a modal for new authenticated users to enter and save their name via backend profile APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, transactions, reports, and dashboard summaries via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes plus print styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard metrics, charts, and greetings using fetched summary and profile data with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/KasirPage.tsx: Implements a cashier interface with cart management, payment validation, and transaction submission using React hooks and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LaporanPage.tsx: Displays daily and monthly reports with date filtering, formatting helpers, and CSV export/print functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides an Internet Identity login flow with status handling, error display, and basic app feature info.
frontend/src/pages/PengeluaranPage.tsx: Handles creation and listing of expenses, including form validation, monthly expense fetching, and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, containers, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for Zie’s Kitchen, listing existing features and pending requests related to backdated cashier transactions. Contains metadata for project versioning, issues, and architectural notes.
